title: YAI – AI-Powered App for Psychiatrists
description:
YAI is a cutting-edge mobile application developed using Angular and Ionic, tailored specifically for psychiatrists and mental health professionals. Inspired by the intuitive user experience and sleek interface of the ChatGPT mobile app, YAI offers an AI-powered assistant to support medical professionals in their day-to-day tasks.

The app provides a seamless, conversational interface where psychiatrists can ask questions, receive suggestions, generate clinical notes, and access mental health resources—all powered by advanced AI integration.

Key Features:

✅ Sleek and modern UI inspired by ChatGPT
✅ Real-time AI chat functionality for professional support
✅ Responsive design with smooth animations
✅ Dark and light mode compatibility
✅ Cross-platform support (Android & iOS)
✅ Built with Angular & Ionic for performance and scalability

Whether you're a healthcare startup or a solo practitioner, YAI demonstrates my ability to build AI-integrated mobile applications with a clean, intuitive UI and efficient performance.

Tech Stack:
🔧 Angular • Ionic • TypeScript • HTML/CSS • Firebase • AI API Integration

title: OSP Pakistan – Landing Page
description:
I designed and developed a modern, responsive landing page for OSP Pakistan, a state-of-the-art cold storage and ice manufacturing facility. The page was built using pure HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, ensuring fast load times, mobile responsiveness, and an engaging user experience.

OSP Pakistan is positioned to serve local, regional, and global clients, enhancing their supply chain operations through reliable storage and distribution services. The landing page communicates the company's core values—innovation, scale, and efficiency—with a clear, persuasive layout.

Key Features:

✅ Eye-catching hero section with bold branding
✅ Clean layout highlighting services and capabilities
✅ Responsive design for all screen sizes
✅ Scroll-based animations and smooth transitions
✅ Lightweight and performance-optimized
✅ Built-in contact form for inquiries and lead generation

Design Goals:

🌐 Establish a strong online presence for OSP Pakistan
📱 Ensure accessibility on all devices with Bootstrap responsiveness
🚀 Keep performance fast with minimal dependencies
📈 Drive interest from logistics and supply chain partners

Tech Stack:
🧊 HTML5 • CSS3 • Bootstrap 5 • JavaScript

title: myDawa – eCommerce Website for Health Products
description:
myDawa is a feature-rich eCommerce platform built specifically for selling healthcare and wellness products online. Developed using Angular, Tailwind CSS, HTML, and SCSS, the platform offers a smooth, modern shopping experience tailored for pharmacies, supplement vendors, and health-focused brands.

From prescription products to fitness supplements and personal care items, myDawa provides a scalable solution for online health retail with a fully responsive design and seamless performance across devices.

Key Features:
✅ Clean and modern UI using Tailwind CSS and SCSS
✅ Product catalog with advanced filtering and search
✅ Shopping cart and secure checkout functionality
✅ User account management with order history
✅ Admin panel for product & inventory management
✅ Fully responsive and mobile-optimized layout
✅ SEO-ready with structured content and fast load speeds

Design & Development Highlights:
📱 Mobile-first, intuitive UI/UX with real-time interactions
⚙️ Built on Angular for robust SPA architecture and performance
💳 Ready for integration with payment gateways like Stripe or PayPal
🚚 Support for shipping, tracking, and custom delivery options
📊 Easily extendable for analytics, user reviews, or subscription models

Tech Stack:
🛒 Angular • Tailwind CSS • HTML5 • SCSS • TypeScript

myDawa is a powerful showcase of my skills in building scalable, high-performance web applications, with a focus on modern eCommerce functionality, responsive design principles, and clean, maintainable code.

title: Smart Balancer – Finance & Expense Management App
description:
Smart Balancer is a full-featured finance and bookkeeping mobile app developed using Angular with Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS. Designed to streamline budgeting, expense tracking, and financial planning, the app takes inspiration from Zoho Books and delivers a clean, professional UI with powerful financial tools.

Built for individuals and small businesses, Smart Balancer provides users with real-time insights into income, expenses, account balances, and financial trends—all accessible on the go across Android and iOS devices.

Key Features:
✅ User-friendly dashboard with real-time income and expense summary
✅ Ability to add, edit, and categorize financial transactions
✅ Generate visual financial reports and balance charts
✅ Support for multiple accounts and currencies
✅ Export financial data in PDF or CSV format
✅ Secure login with cloud-based data synchronization
✅ Cross-platform mobile support built with Angular & Ionic

Design & Development Highlights:
📱 Mobile-first design with an intuitive, professional UI/UX
⚙️ Built using Angular for a performant and scalable SPA structure
📈 Integrated Chart.js for dynamic, real-time financial visualizations
💼 Supports multi-account, multi-currency bookkeeping workflows
🔐 Emphasis on data security, backup, and cloud syncing
📤 Export-ready architecture for easy financial record keeping

Tech Stack:
📊 Angular • TypeScript • Chart.js • HTML5 • Tailwind CSS • Bootstrap • Ionic

Smart Balancer is a strong example of my expertise in building modern, scalable, and responsive financial apps, combining sleek design with robust accounting functionality.

title: SoftoTeam–Landing Page (Responsive&SEO Optimized )
description:
I designed and developed a high-converting, responsive landing page for SoftoTeam, a modern Human Resource Management (HRM) application built to simplify workforce operations for businesses of all sizes.

The landing page features a clean, professional design that reflects the product's focus on trust, efficiency, and innovation—ideal for SaaS solutions targeting HR teams. It clearly communicates the platform’s value proposition and encourages user engagement through compelling visuals and CTAs.

Key Sections:
✅ Hero section with prominent call-to-action
✅ Feature highlights: Payroll, Attendance, Recruitment, Performance
✅ Social proof with client/company logos
✅ SEO-optimized, mobile-first layout

Design Goals:
📈 Increase conversions through structured layout and persuasive copy
📱 Fully mobile-responsive and cross-browser compatible
🚀 Fast-loading and optimized for Core Web Vitals
🔍 SEO-friendly with schema markup and meta optimization

Tech Stack:
🌐 HTML • SCSS • Bootstrap • JavaScript

This project showcases my ability to craft visually compelling, performance-optimized landing pages tailored for SaaS products—driving traffic, engagement, and conversions for modern digital brands.

title: WebMantis – Service Provider Website Built
description:
WebMantis is a sleek, responsive website developed for a multi-service provider offering a wide range of digital and IT solutions. Built entirely with core HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap 5, the site delivers a fast, lightweight, and accessible experience optimized for all devices.

The primary goal was to design a visually striking and highly functional platform that showcases the client’s diverse service portfolio in a clean, structured, and user-friendly layout. The navigation is smooth, and the design is crafted to help users quickly discover the services they need without friction.

Core Services Highlighted:
• UI/UX Design
• Web Development
• Cyber Security
• SaaS Solutions
• Product Development
• CRM Integration & Cloud Services
• Software & App Development
• Digital & Multimedia Marketing
• Event & Corporate Management
• Artificial Intelligence (AI)

Key Features:
✅ Fully responsive layout using Bootstrap’s grid system
✅ Interactive service sections with hover and scroll-triggered animations
✅ Clean, semantic HTML structure for better SEO and maintainability
✅ Lightweight JavaScript for smooth interactivity
✅ Optimized performance with minimal external dependencies
✅ Professional and modern design tailored for a B2B audience

Tech Stack:
💻 HTML5 • CSS3 • JavaScript • Bootstrap 5

WebMantis is a strong example of my ability to build performant, user-centric websites from scratch using core web technologies—ideal for service providers and enterprise-focused digital brands.

Visit the live project: 🌐 https://webmantis.co/
